turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to place an order at Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order the caffè mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, would you like to add any milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. Add whole milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: any whipped cream with your drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what size would you like that in?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: toll.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering a tall caffe mocha with whole milk, correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, one moment while i place that order for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i have ordered a tall caffe mocha with whole milk to be picked up at the starbucks in westlake, daly city, ca, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually, I would like to pick up my order at the Starbucks on 3595 California Street, San Francisco.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, let me transfer your order there, one moment.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i have transferred your order to the starbucks on california street in san francisco, it should be ready for pickup in 6 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, sounds good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be texted to you, can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nothing else.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your coffee.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right, thanks.
